title: Can't log in
body: After updating new patch, I can't not log in. Does anyone have same problem?? Im playing on Mac

replies.body:
Hey there,

Apologies for the delayed response.

Could you try [switching to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#mq4) for me, let me know if this helps at all.
same something about a RAD error even finding a way around it the log in still doesnt work even though servers are "online"
i thought it's just happened to me. So is everyone else does the same?
